summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Silver Stone Park Resort website. All major features working correctly including back button navigation, contact information display, WhatsApp integration, hover animations, form submissions, and mobile responsiveness.

ui_bugs.issue: Click interception preventing lightbox from opening - overlay element blocking image clicks

passed_tests: Homepage loading and hero section display
Contact number 6282427265 display in header and footer
WhatsApp floating button with correct number 916282427265
Back button appears on all pages except homepage
Back button navigation to previous page
Booking modal opens and closes correctly
Hover animations on feature cards (3 cards)
Hover animations on testimonial cards (3 cards)
Contact form submission with success message
Mobile responsive design with hamburger menu
Gallery page with 9 images and category filters
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix gallery lightbox click interception issue - overlay element is blocking clicks on gallery images preventing lightbox from opening
